Synopsis: Tells the module to create artefact of specified type
Description:
Tells the module to create artefact of specified type
There can be multiple artefacts created (even of same type)
At least one packed artefact is required for publishing to GitHub

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Markdown: standard artefact, packed with tag name without any additional modules or required modules

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 3
Examples.Markdown: Create artefact in form of a script. This is useful for very simple modules that should be just single PS1 file

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 4
Examples.Markdown:
Create artefact in form of a script. This is useful for very simple modules that should be just single PS1 file
But additionally pack it into zip fileĄŚż$%#
